original: FANT, Gösta, Ingenjör, Ålsten, f 5/8 84 av stins C G F o Lydia Lénström, gm Vicky Myrberg. Sala allm lärov, ex Tekn sk Sthlm (maskin) 04, stud Tyskl 04—06. Ing Fören El AB Sthlm o Ludvika 06—14, därav fil.ch i Sydam 09—11, ch f Graham Brothers el avd Sthlm 13—34, komm. repres. f Mather Platt Ltd, London, sed. 34, aut sprinkleranläggn. Ag villa i Ålsten. Styr.led AB Kristian Sthlm. Resor: Tyskl 04—06, Frankr, Engl, Sydam 09—11, Danm, Norge, Finl. Av trycket: Div upps i fackpress om radiosänd o centralradio-anläggn, aut eldsläckn m sprinkler, släckn av oljebränd m Mulsifyre-syst. Sv Tekn.frn, Sthlms Sportfiskeklubb. Hobbies: Jakt, fiske, orientering, blomsterodling, litteratur.
translated:
FANT, Gösta, Engineer, Ålsten, b. 5/8 84 to stationmaster C G F and Lydia Lénström, m. Vicky Myrberg. Graduate of Sala General School, Technical School Stockholm (mechanical) 04, studied German 04-06. Engineer at El AB Stockholm and Ludvika 06-14, including a degree in South America 09-11, head of Graham Brothers electrical department Stockholm 13-34, commissioned representative of Mather Platt Ltd, London, since 34, author of sprinkler systems at Ag Villa in Ålsten. Board member of AB Kristian Stockholm. Travels: German 04-06, France, England, South America 09-11, Denmark, Norway, Finland. Publications: Various articles in trade press on radio transmitting and central radio systems, automatic sprinkler fire extinguishing, and extinguishing oil fires with the Mulsifyre system. Member of the Swedish Society of Technology, Stockholm Sports Fishing Club. Hobbies: Hunting, fishing, orienteering, gardening, literature.

Note: The abbreviation '\d\d m. partners name' indicates the person got married in the year 19xx.

publications: Various articles in trade press on radio transmitting and central radio systems
Extinguishing oil fires with the Mulsifyre system

career.occupational_title: Chief of Graham Brothers electrical department
